title: Google Assistant "Read It" feature works on new phone after initial setup, but not after update
content: I have a new Pixel 5. One of my problems has been the failure of Google Assistant's "Read It" feature, for reading web pages. Every time I tried to use it the device reported no web page available to read. I checked all kinds of settings, including using screen context, but never solved the problem. I desperation, I wiped all data from the phone and performed a new setup. Voila!  The webpage reading feature worked with the fresh install. Success was short-lived, however. This morning I noticed an outstanding update fo Pixel Stand. When Iet it update, the feature became disfunctional again. I immediately uninstalled Pixel Stand and now I'm back in business. Is this a known issue with Google Stand and the "Read It" feature?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
